summary:
Basketball is a fast-paced team sport played by two teams on a rectangular court. The goal is to score points by shooting a ball through the opponent's hoop. Each team has five players with specific positions, like center, forward, and guard. Players dribble, pass, and shoot to score. A game can end in a tie, leading to extra time (overtime).

Invented in 1891 by James Naismith, basketball has grown into a global sport. The NBA is the top professional league, while the WNBA is the main women's league. Internationally, the FIBA World Cup and the Olympics are major events, showcasing national teams from around the world.
title: Basketball
